name: Deploy VitePress to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [master]
  workflow_dispatch:  # 允许手动触发

# 权限设置
permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

# 并发控制
concurrency:
  group: pages
  cancel-in-progress: false

env:
  NODE_VERSION: 20
  PNPM_VERSION: 8

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0
      
      - name: Setup pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
        with:
          version: ${{ env.PNPM_VERSION }}
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: pnpm
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pnpm install
      
      - name: Debug - Show directory structure
        run: |
          echo "项目根目录:"
          ls -la
          echo -e "\n文档目录:"
          ls -la docs/ 2>/dev/null || echo "docs 目录不存在"
          echo -e "\n.vitepress 目录:"
          ls -la .vitepress/ 2>/dev/null || echo ".vitepress 目录不存在"
          ls -la docs/.vitepress/ 2>/dev/null || echo "docs/.vitepress 目录不存在"
      
      - name: Build with VitePress
        run: |
          # 尝试两种构建方式
          echo "正在构建..."
          pnpm run docs:build || echo "构建失败"
      
      - name: Debug - Check build output
        run: |
          echo "检查构建输出目录..."
          if [ -d ".vitepress/dist" ]; then
            echo "找到 .vitepress/dist 目录"
            ls -la .vitepress/dist/
            BUILD_PATH=".vitepress/dist"
          elif [ -d "docs/.vitepress/dist" ]; then
            echo "找到 docs/.vitepress/dist 目录"
            ls -la docs/.vitepress/dist/
            BUILD_PATH="docs/.vitepress/dist"
          elif [ -d "dist" ]; then
            echo "找到 dist 目录"
            ls -la dist/
            BUILD_PATH="dist"
          else
            echo "错误: 找不到构建输出目录"
            ls -la
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "BUILD_PATH=$BUILD_PATH" >> $GITHUB_ENV
      
      - name: Upload artifact
        id: upload
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: ${{ env.BUILD_PATH || '.vitepress/dist' }}
      
      - name: Debug - Upload summary
        if: always()
        run: |
          echo "Artifact upload 结果: ${{ steps.upload.outcome }}"

  deploy:
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
